summary: This is an email from an FBI dropbox system to FBI Special Agent Sean P. Watson, notifying him that files related to Jeffrey Epstein's child sex trafficking case have been uploaded to the FBI's network. The email includes an attachment with a case file on Epstein.

persons.name: Sean P. Watson
persons.context: Recipient of an email notification regarding uploaded files on the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the uploaded case file, identified in the attachment's filename for child sex trafficking.

connections.description: FBI Special Agent Watson is receiving case files related to the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein for child sex trafficking.

events.title: Epstein Child Sex Trafficking Case File Upload
events.description: A case file titled 'Epstein_Jeffrey_Child_Sex_Trafficking' is uploaded to the FBI network, as indicated in the email attachment filename.

keyFacts: An FBI system email from August 9, 2019, confirms the upload of case files related to Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking.
The uploaded file's name explicitly identifies Jeffrey Epstein as the subject of a child sex trafficking investigation.
FBI Special Agent Sean P. Watson in New York is the designated recipient of this case file notification.
